	\section{Nomenclature} % MUST
	\subsection{Nomenclature for Model Equations} % MUST
	
	%variables for model equations
	\begin{tabular}{ll}
		$x$ & state vector \\
		$u$ & control input vector \\
		$w$ & noise vector \\
		$z$ & regulated output vector \\
		$y$ & measurement vector \\
		
				
	\end{tabular}
	 

	
	%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% MDOEL EQUATIONS %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
	
	\section{Model Equations} % MUST
	
	State Vector and Input Vector:
	\begin{align*}
		x &\in\mathbb{R}^7
		u &\in\mathbb{R}^2
		w &\in\mathbb{R}^1
		z &\in\mathbb{R}^4
		y &\in\mathbb{R}^4
	\end{align*}
	
	\noindent System Equations:			
	\begin{subequations}
	\begin{align}
		\dot{x}(t) &= Ax(t) + B_1w(t) + Bu(t) \\
		z(t) &= C_1x(t) + D_{11}w(t) + D{12}u(t) \\
		y(t) &= Cx(t) + D{21}w(t)
	\end{align}
	\end{subequations}

	%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% PARAMETERS | OUTPUTS %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
	\noindent
	
	\\
	Outputs: $z$ % MAY

	\section{Derivation and Explanation} % SHOULD
	This model is part of the \href{http://www.compleib.de/}{"`COMPleib"' - library} and was 
	automatically imported into ACKREP.\\
	The original description was:\\
	TF1 Terrain following model E. Gershon, Shaked, Yaesh, Tech.-Rep. 2003 Uni. Tel-Aviv "Static output feedback of state multiplicative systems with application to terrain following" Note This is not a classical SOF control design --> special ROC Q Is the problem SOF stabilizable too ?
	\textit{Not available}
